long_description: As light as the feathers of the swallows that adorn it, the Avery Infinity Scarf from Pistil proves you don't have to give up scarves just because the weather gets warm. Thin cotton fabric is naturally soft, lightweight and breathable. Infinity scarf is tied at the ends, providing a looped, layered look.
short_description: As light as the feathers of the swallows that adorn it, the Avery Infinity Scarf from Pistil proves you don't have to give up scarves just because the weather gets warm.
